capability.name: Marketdataswitchadministration
capability.definition: This service domain administers the internal information distribution system with external market information feeds and associated employee access rights, including brokering information access on a first-come-first-serve basis for limited user feeds
capability.role: Administer the internal information distribution 'switch' with external and external market information feeds and associated employee access rights. Note this can include 'brokering' information access on a first come first serve basis for limited active user number feed services
capability.example: A new employee is provided with the standard access to information feed at their trading desk

key_features.name: Administer internal information distribution switch
key_features.description: Enables administer internal information distribution switch to support this service domain administers the internal information distribution system with external market information feeds and associated employee access rights, including brokering information access on a first-come-first-serve basis for limited user feeds
